name: Meow's life
description:
Meow's life Game This was meant to be for KAUSTxSandsoft Game Jam 2021

but unfortunately, we didn't make it during the submission period.

However, I'm thrilled of joy to know my team lovely people and I had fun making this game as a developer and this was our first time and we were satisfied, I promise them I will upload the game anyway.

so have fun playing it ♡

work by :

  1. Abdullah Shalhoub: a story writer
  2. Khalid Sonbul: designer and artist
  3. Elaf Barak: designer an artist
  4. Ahmad Zuhair: sound designer
  5. Tahani Mohammad: devloper
  6. Esraa Alsharit: devloper
